title: [OCE] Ranked w/ ADC Prodigy and upcoming Best ADC OCE
body: Thats about it. Want to know more just ask in stream.

replies.body:
A plat 3 smurfing in bronze-silver Elo is pretty sad.

**Calls himself a prodigy, smurfs in bronze. LMAO!**

Honestly, don't smurf in bronze.


And for the love of god. quit being so vulgar everytime you open you're mouth. It sounds terrible.

See the thing is Tunasalad is that my whole base on twitch is that I am  vulgar and I am not afraid to say nearly anything. The thing about my stream is I want people to come in and feel  comfortable with saying what they want (mostly) and not be tied down by social standards of stupid words that society gives meaning to because they are "bad". Being vulgar is who i am and how I grew up in the household and I'm not going to change unless it affects me. The thing is, I'm not plat 3 anymore, I'm plat 1 and I love what I say and do and others seem to love it as well otherwise i wouldn't have 109 followers.
